game.name: Soul Tides
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fast-paced multiplayer auto-battler where strategy is everything. Command fallen warriors, cursed beasts, and arcane horrors as you battle to regain the favor of the dark lord. Master the art of summoning, resource management, and unit customization in this fantasy tug-of-war showdown!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fast-paced multiplayer auto-battler where strategy is everything. Command fallen warriors, cursed beasts, and arcane horrors as you battle to regain the favor of the dark lord. Master the art of summoning, resource management, and unit customization in this fantasy tug-of-war showdown!
